mapper.select: select book.title,hilight.content,DATE_FORMAT(hilight.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date,content.chapter_title,content.chapter_no,hilight.hilight_no,book.img_path,book.book_no from book,hilight,content where book.book_no=hilight.book_no and hilight.user_no=#{user_no} and hilight.content_no=content.content_no order by book.title asc
mapper.delete: delete from hilight where user_no = #{user_no} and book_no = #{book_no}
